Posts.EditableText: nooooooooooo, i like to call it QNL that way, you know that QNL is the script which can be used for questnet games, and wont work in singleplayer games, and ASL is just the main script.... anyway, what the script that outputs the playername?... hold on i think its in the arena sourcecode somewhere...
Posts.HTML:
nooooooooooo, i like to call it QNL that way, you know that QNL is the script which can be used for questnet games, and wont work in singleplayer games, and ASL is just the main script....

Posts.EditableText:
It's $name(whatever)$.

The scope command allowing for easily implemented player and world variables of questnet has made making big multiplayer games a million times easier.
Posts.HTML:
It's $name(whatever)$.

The scope command allowing for easily implemented player and world variables of questnet has made making big multiplayer games a million times easier.

Posts.EditableText: $name(%userid%)$ is the correct useage for that, but thank you ITIB
Posts.HTML: $name(%userid%)$ is the correct useage for that, but thank you ITIB
